name: Personal-website
body:
### Welcome to My personal Website Pages.
www.hansenwang.ml

This page contains my basic information.

Also some of my personal opinion about some of the biggest companies' movements like Apple Inc.

If you want to contact me, you can find my contact information on my site.

There is a build-in email system on my site as well that allows you to send email to me directly.

Thanks for visiting my personal website.

### Language and Framework used
The site is mainly build by Html5/PHP/CSS3/JQuery

The framework I used: Bootstrap/Fullpage.js

### Authors and Contributors
@WangHansen
 
### Support or Contact
Having any problem you want to contact me?

Go to www.hansenwang.ml
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
